entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Quinte West
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:23 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 09:17 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -3.0°C

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
